EmailTemplate.description: Email template for co-promoter data review group when a new co-promoter record is created or updated
EmailTemplate.name: Co-Promoter Data Review Template
EmailTemplate.subject: Alert: New Co-Promoter Record has been created or updated and needs review
EmailTemplate.textOnly: This email notification is to alert you that a new co-promoter record has been created or updated and requires review. Link to the co-promoter record: {!Account.Link}
